CBOT_SESSION.description: Qr.Js to get Session. Type here yours CBOT Session.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. English => en (you can use English only

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for  some images and videos generated by CyberBot

CALL_BLOCK.description: THIS IS ANTI-CALL BLOCKING SYSTEM ...IT WILL BLOCK WHEN SOME CALL U ...IF YOU NEED IT TURN ON => (true) else to TURN OFF =>(false).

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes auto reply sticker you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_VIDEO.description: If you likes auto reply video you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

THUMB_IMG.description: If you need a different thumbnail,  you can add Base64 String of your image.you can convert Base64 String from https://codebeautify.org/image-to-base64-converter [Base64 String]

AUTO_BÄ°O.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

ALL_LINK_BAN.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks all link

TALKING_CHATBOT.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.
MUTE_MESSAGE.value: *_HAD CHANGE THIS GROUP TO ALLOW ONLY ADMINS CAN SEND MESSAGE_*

THERI_LIST.description: bad word ban...  add the bad words you dont allow in your grp (THERI_KICK must be true to run this feature) example: plk-dqz,f**k,d**k

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 947xxxx && 947xxxx-1xxx or 947xxxx,947xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.
UNMUTE_MESSAGE.value: *_HAD CHANGE THIS GROUP TO ALLOW ALL CAN SEND MESSAGE TO THIS GROUP_*

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.
BLOCK_MESSAGE.value: ```You Are Added To The Blacklist For 1-DAY```

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: Bot Working Type. If you use â€œpublicâ€, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use â€œprivateâ€, only you can use your bot.and if you use â€œadminâ€, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Removes the background of the photos. https://remove.bg

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.
